sentences.en: A spoilt child is rarely popular with other children.
sentences.cn: 被宠坏的孩子很难得到其他孩子的喜爱。

sentences.en: Adolescent suicide is rarely an impulsive reaction to immediate distress.
sentences.cn: 青少年自杀很少是由于突然发生不幸而作出的冲动反应。

sentences.en: Adults rarely give the television their undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 成年人很少会专心地看电视。

sentences.en: Dark-skinned people rarely develop skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 黑皮肤的人很少得皮肤癌。

sentences.en: Despite his hectic work schedule, Benny has rarely suffered poor health.
sentences.cn: 尽管工作繁忙，本尼却少有身体不好的时候。

sentences.en: Guscott rarely speaks out, preferring to keep his own counsel.
sentences.cn: 古斯科特很少发表意见，他更喜欢把自己的看法埋在心里。

sentences.en: He is rarely satisfied with anything less than perfection itself.
sentences.cn: 他一般只对那些绝对完美的事情感到满意。

sentences.en: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.cn: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。

sentences.en: I have rarely read anything so insultingly sexist as this article.
sentences.cn: 我很少读到像这篇文章般带有侮辱性的性别歧视的东西。

sentences.en: I rarely go to that restaurant for lunch.
sentences.cn: 我很少到那家餐厅吃午饭。

sentences.en: I'm rarely under pressure and my co-workers are always nice to me.
sentences.cn: 我很少感受到压力，同事们一直对我很好。

sentences.en: More rarely, the tubes have been malformed from birth.
sentences.cn: 这些管状器官先天畸形的现象更加少见。

sentences.en: Newspaper reports rarely get anyone's name  right.
sentences.cn: 新闻报道很少把人的姓名搞对。

sentences.en: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine.
sentences.cn: 她只是偶尔才喝杯红酒，让自己享受一下。

sentences.en: Rarely do schoolteachers have leeway to teach classes the way they want.
sentences.cn: 鲜有学校老师可随心所欲地教书的情况。

sentences.en: Rarely, if ever, does he sidestep a question.
sentences.cn: 他极少逃避问题。

sentences.en: She is rarely seen in public nowadays.
sentences.cn: 如今她很少公开露面。

sentences.en: They battled against other Indian tribes, but rarely fought with the whites.
sentences.cn: 他们同其他印第安部落作战，但很少与白人并肩对敌。

sentences.en: They were rarely seen together and certainly did not travel together.
sentences.cn: 很少见到他们在一起，当然更不可能一起旅行。

sentences.en: We rarely agree on what to do.
sentences.cn: 我们很少在要做的事情上看法一致。

sentences.en: We rarely see someone go after the health area.
sentences.cn: 我们很少见到有人在健康领域做文章。

sentences.en: You feel that rarely any more in the US.
sentences.cn: 而你在美国很少有这样的感觉。

trans.tran_en: If something rarely happens, it does not happen very often
